metadata.title: CVE-2023-4363 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in WebShare in Google Chrome on Android priorto 116.0.5845.96 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of adialog URL via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
